name: show_document
description: Show a card so user can interactively view one or multiple confluence pages or documents from selected knowledge base collections/sources. Use this when the user wants to view a known document.

name: remove_document
description: Show a card so user can interactively view one or multiple confluence pages or documents from selected knowledge base collections/sources. Use this when the user wants to view a known document.

name: add_document
description: Show a card so user can interactively add new confluence pages or document files to the knowledge base.

name: data_sources
description: Show a card so user can interactively select the data collections/infomation sources used for knowledge base searches and query .

name: rag_query
description: Searches the company's knowledge base/internal information/data sources to get relevant context for a user's question/task.

query.description: The question or query to ask rag_query to retrieve info from knowledge base/internal data. Keep user question language. Don't truncate user instruction.

language.description: The language of the query. If not provided, it defaults to 'en'.

name: n8n_mcp
description: Execute workflows through N8N with MCP integration. The query must always preserve the original user language (do not translate). Provides access to Jira (tickets, issues) and Confluence (pages, documentation) for project and documentation management.

query.description: User request or task to be processed by the N8N workflow. Keep the query exactly in the original language entered by the user.

name: web_search
description: Use this action for any user question that requires up-to-date, real-world, or external information that is not available in the internal knowledge base.

query.description: The query to search the web

name: toggle_web_search
description: Use this action only when the user explicitly asks to enable or disable the web search feature. Do not use for answering information queries.

name: create_collection_request
description: Show a card so user can interactively initiate the process to creat or add a new collection/data sources to the knowledge base.

name: get_supported_commands
description: Return a adaptive card showing supported bot commands to user.

name: clear_history
description: Clear/delete chat/conversation history when user requests to clear conversation history or context.
